mapper.select: select o.name,WEEK(c.create_time) as weekofyear,count(1) as count from check_danger_checklist c INNER JOIN org o on c.org_fk=o.id where c.check_type = '周排查记录' and c.org_fk = #{orgId} and c.create_time >= #{startTime} and c.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY o.name,WEEK(c.create_time)

select o.name,WEEK(c.create_time) as weekofyear,l.level_name,count(1) as count from check_danger_checklist c INNER JOIN org o on c.org_fk=o.id INNER JOIN check_offgrade_list l on l.id = c.offgrade_list_fk where c.check_type = '周排查记录' and c.org_fk = #{orgId} and c.create_time >= #{startTime} and c.create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY o.name,WEEK(c.create_time),l.level_name order by l.level_num
